section.title: compressWhitespace
section.para: Description: Replaces one or more consecutive whitespace characters with a single space.

Replaces various whitespace characters with spaces. In addition, consecutive whitespace characters will be reduced down to a single space. Whitespace characters are: 0x20, \f, \t, \n, \r, \v, 0xa0 (non-breaking white space).

section.title: count
section.para: Description: Given a collection, it returns the number if items in the collection. Given a scalar, returns 1.

section.title: length
section.para: Description: Returns the byte length of the value.

section.title: lowercase
section.para: Description: Returns the input as all lower case characters.

section.title: removeWhitespace
section.para: Description: Removes one or more consecutive whitespace characters.
Similar to compressWhitespace, except removes the characters instead of replacing them with a single space.

section.title: trim
section.para: Description: Removes consecutive whitespace from the beginning and end of the input.

section.title: trimLeft
section.para: Description: Removes consecutive whitespace from the beginning of the input.

section.title: trimRight
section.para: Description: Removes consecutive whitespace from the end of the input.

section.title: min
section.para: Description: Given a collecion of numeric data, returns the minimum value.

section.title: max
section.para: Description: Given a collection of numeric data, returns the maximum value.
